ref: 12710a †śrīparṇī -- f. ʻ the tree Gmelina arborea ʼ Hcat., ˚ṇikā<-> f. ʻ Myristica malabarica and Myrica sapida ʼ Bhpr., ˚ṇa -- n. ʻ Premna spinosa or longifolia ʼ Hcat. [śrīˊ -- , parṇá -- ]
Pk. sīvaṇṇī, sīvannī -- f. ʻ a partic. kind of tree ʼ;
M. śivan, śivnī f. ʻ a partic. timber -- tree ʼ, śivaṇ, śivṇī f. ʻ Gmelina arborea (a timber -- tree) ʼ,
hal. sivnā ʻ a partic. tree ʼ (T. Burrow 18.6.79).
